text: [Music]
everybody experiences their time at
Harvard in a totally unique way at the
end of the day you're happiest when
you're spending your time and your
resources on the activities and the
opportunities that really get you
excited I worked in policy at the
Brookings institution doing Healthcare
work I realized that I wanted not only a
policy skill set but also a business
skill set to go out and be able to help
create the vehicles that really can
scale policy reform across the
country The Joint degree program at
Harvard is both a master's in Business
Administration and a master's in public
policy that you get to do in three years
instead of four what really attracted me
was how integrated the program is it's
one community of people across the three
years and they do a lot uh through
classes that you get to take each year
at both schools to make it feel like
it's one cohesive
program my experience has been that in
the Kennedy School we generally try to
to think really big picture you know how
do we change policies how do we look at
big macro Trends in the world and and
try to impact
them at the business school there's a
lot more focus on what are the skill
sets that you need to to be a change
agent like within an organization or as
an entrepreneur I think the program
works really well in an integrated
way the joint degree cohort has been by
far the most positive experience for me
the students come from a really wide
array of backgrounds but most of us have
had some experience in the the public or
or nonprofit sector and some experience
in the private sector we've gotten to
come together through these joint degree
classes and the social events and I
really kind of opened my eyes to issues
or to skill sets that weren't on my
Horizon before that I've gotten to learn
a lot more
about after the joint degree program I'm
going to be starting at a very early
stage Behavioral Health startup in San
Francisco The Joint degree program has
really helped given me the understanding
through the Kennedy School of how the
healthcare World works but I also feel
like I'm coming in with a real set of of
business skills that I can use to
hopefully help start and grow this this
Enterprise
